content: stitch to join them the 42 stitches on both pieces should line up stuff before working the last few pieces to close round 20 decrease 5sc x 6 36 round 21 double_crochet tc chain slip_stitch in the tc you just made tc double_crochet slip_stitch x 9 45 excluding the chain and slip_stitch used to create a point in the flap finish off _________________________________________________________________________ wings with cream yarn attach yarn to the top of the body where the magic_ring is 8 chain single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch to where yarn is attached repeat for the other wing finish off _________________________________________________________________________ legs with black yarn attach yarn to base of body 5 chain 4 single_crochet starting in second chain from hook slip_stitch to where yarn is attached make 4 legs evenly spaced in a horizontal line from one flank of the body of the flea to the other the space between the two fluff flaps made in round 11 of the main body is the front finish off after each leg or cut a long piece of yarn and make all 4 legs with it moving it from the spot of one leg to another with a needle through the flea _________________________________________________________________________ mouth with beige yarn magic_ring 5hdc in magic_ring finish off make another piece like this with black yarn do a slip knot then 5 single_crochet on the 5 half_double_crochet of one of the beige pieces then continue on to do 5 single_crochet on the 5 half_double_crochet of the other beige piece thus attaching the two finish off with pink yarn magic_ring 5 half_double_crochet in magic_ring slip_stitch in magic_ring double_crochet in magic_ring slip_stitch in magic_ring slip_stitch in first half_double_crochet finish off with black yarn do a slip knot then 5 single_crochet on the 5 half_double_crochet of the pink piece finish off sew the pieces onto the body slightly overlaying the paired beige pieces over the pink piece _________________________________________________________________________
